org.supremica.automata
Interface Supervisor

All Known Implementing Classes:
CompositionalSupervisor, ModularSupervisor, MonolithicSupervisor
public interface Supervisor

Interface describing the methods of a supervisor. You can ask a supervisor whether a particular event is enabled currently (call the isEnabled-method) and you can inform it that you have executed an event so that it can change state properly (call the executeEvent-method).

Method Summary
 void executeEvent(LabeledEvent event)
          Executes the event event; changes the current internal state of the supervisor.
 Alphabet getAlphabet()
          Returns the alphabet of the supervisor.
 Automata getAsAutomata()
          Returns automata representation of supervisor.
 boolean isEnabled(LabeledEvent event)
          Returns true if the event event is enabled by the supervisor in its current state.
 void reset()
          Returns the supervisor to its initial state.
